page.title: 16Traffic in our area
page.content: We did a traffic survey outside our school on Monday 13th May 1985 between 1.45 and 1.55pm. A total of 184 vehicles passed the school: 125 cars, 20 lorries, 22 vans 5 buses, 1 motor bike and 13 taxis. A few weeks ago Carrie who is in primary 6 was knocked down in Calder street which is near our school. She ran across the road to the shops and ended up in hospital with cuts and bruises. We have 2 lollipop people to help us cross the busy roads. The lights at Whifflet street are very busy with lorries, buses and cars. There is a green man but we still need the lollipop man to help us.
